author: rhuijben
msg: Use uri joining for in-repository paths, to avoid dirent specifics,
like uppercasing drive letters on windows as in the "c:hi" examples.
svn_fs_fs__dag_copy): Use uri joining for in-repository paths.
(svn_ra_local__do_check_path): Use uri joining for filesystem paths.

author: rhuijben
msg: Make svn_dirent_is_absolute() only return true when
svn_dirent_get_absolute() called on that same path returns the same value.
This resolves an issue with lower cased drive letters in Windows, that
(svn_dirent_is_absolute): Don't assume a lowercase drive letter is absolute.
(test_dirent_is_absolute): Add two test values, verifying the new behavior and
add verification on svn_dirent_get_absolute() value being the same for absolute

author: rhuijben
msg: (open_root): Only check for tree conflicts of parents when there is a
working copy instead of relying on the ancestor walk in
alread_in_a_tree_conflict() to stop in the right place.
This should fix hwright's local failures.

author: cmpilato
msg: Tweak the mergeinfo-related libsvn_client utility functions to expect
paths relative to the RA session (instead of to the root of the
Now require that incoming paths are relative to the RA session.
functions to expect their incoming paths to be relative to the
(get_mergeinfo): Reparent (as needed) the RA session before calling
(get_full_mergeinfo): Pass NULL for the RA session in the
call to svn_client__get_wc_or_repos_mergeinfo().  This might not be the
most efficient thing in the world, but I'm aiming for correctness
(calculate_target_mergeinfo): Calculate the path relative to the
session and pass it off to svn_client__get_repos_mergeinfo().
